name: No, I'm Not A Human
storyline: Horror about the exploding sun and 'guests' who crawl out from underground with unclear intentions from Violent Horror Stories: anthology is now in a new package! Find out how to distinguish a human from a 'guest.' Who can be saved, and who will try to kill the people around? You make decisions that will affect the future lives of those you are trying to save.
summary: An intimate story about a disaster and guests from underground. People are breaking into your home, but not all of them are true people.
